div.p: S.D.A., R.J.I., E.R., A.S., L.E.L. and V.V. collected reindeer data. B.B.H. initiated the study. M.G., V.G. and B.B.H. conducted the analyses. B.B.H. and M.G. wrote the first version of the manuscript and S.D.A., A.M.L., B.E.S., R.J.I., E.R., A.S., L.E.L., V.V. and V.G. contributed to discussions and revisions on later manuscript versions.
